name: Wave Machine (pipelonso games)
description:
Work together with your robot companion to survive a killer wave and destroy the wave machine that wants to destroy humanity.
He meets Paco, a human sent to destroy the wave machine to save humanity, but he needs the help of Lumi, his robot companion, to protect him from the killer waves in order to reach his destination.
Controls.
W: Up
A: Left
S: Down
D: Right

Space: Lumi shield activation.

Shift: Run

Left Click: Shot

music in this game: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Bio_Unit__Metre/Spool
